job.title: Postgres Development DBA - Remote
job.description: pstrongAbout UsstrongppbrppSince 2007 Webgility has helped over 10000 companies with ecommerce automation Today we are the 1 automation software for QuickBooks amp NetSuite retailers Business is booming and were growing at warp speedppbrppstrongOur MissionstrongppbrppEmpower small amp mediumsized enterprises to thrive in ecommerce We integrate their systems automate their operations amp deliver powerful insights so they can move faster make better decisions and winppbrppstrongOur Core ValuesstrongppbrppstrongKeep it realstrong We do amazing work but were humble transparent and accountable If we make mistakes we own up and always keep it real No egos pleaseppstrongStay curiousstrong No matter what were working on we give it our 100 Were always learning and feel connected to our team and our customersppstrongLead with datastrong We focus on results not activity We understandboth for ourselves and our customersthat data and software are key We use them both so our work creates real impactppstrongWin as a teamstrongnbsp We come for the job and stay for the people We love good food and drink There are always laughs to be had whether a budget meeting or a bowling partyppEnjoy the journey Our customers often tell us that our software has changed their lives We want to change the face of the ecommerce industry by helping businesses easily run backoffice operationsppbrppstrongAs a development DBA for Webgility you willstrongppbrpulliDesign stable reliable and effective databasesliliCollaborate with a team of worldclass developers on their design decisions giving advice on performance and writing good SQLliliPrepare deployment scripts and produce deployment plansliliPrepare rollback scripts and produce rollback plansliliProvide administration of development testing and staging serversliliOffer consulting on optimal architecture and data modelsliliDetermine enforce and document database policies procedures and standardsliliPerform business requirement analysis with PMliliCreate and manage schema documentation and other technical artifacts relating to developmentliliWork crossteam with other colocated teams remote teams and external partner companiesliulpbrppstrongRequired Job Skills and Experiencestrongppbrpulli4 years work experience as a Database developer building commercial softwareliliBS Degree in Computer Science Electrical amp Computer Engineering Mathematics or equivalent job experienceliliExtensive experience with PostgreSQLliliIndepth understanding of data management eg permissions recovery security and monitoringliliExtensive experience working with agile sprint teams to collaborateliliExcellent analytical and organization skillsliliAn ability to understand frontend users requirements and a problemsolving attitudeliliExcellent verbal and written communication skillsliliResearch and suggest new database products services and protocolsliulpbrppbrppstrongOther RequirementsstrongppbrppMust be a US citizen or authorized to work in the US Visa sponsorship currently not availableppbrppstrongDeep ThoughtsstrongppbrppBe a part of something bigger with more opportunity and ownership of innovative ecommerce solutions Ecommerce continues to grow at record speeds and you can help disrupt the market Did you know In the time it took you to read this there were 200000 searches on eBay and over 45000 autonomous robots now roam Amazon warehouses in search of their next packageppp
